class  ErrorHandler
 C++ error handler associated with the USGS central CA velocity model. More...

Detailed Description

C++ error handler associated with the USGS central CA velocity model (USER INTERFACE).

Use this object to turn logging of errors on or off, set the name of the log file, get information about errors, and reset the status of the error handler.

The log file will generally contain coordinates of points for which data was not found in the velocity model along with a short string indicating the type of error.

The default behavior is no log file is written (the log file is set to /dev/null). To turn logging on, simply set the name of the log file.
